pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell these in bundles of four. Would you like 64 Redstone Dust for $1600?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1600..}] run give @s minecraft:redstone 64');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1600..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1600..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 1600');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');
